Articles.Content: One eye hill looses an eye. My no-eyed hill ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

I show the world to it with words and songs. The hill is all mine now.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-09-26T21:11:08Z" title="09/26/2017 09:11  PM" data-short="6 yr">September 26, 2017</time> by Physics Student**

The hill listens the music and realizes:

> 
> 
> Quote
> 
> 
> [O]utside the ordered universe [is] that amorphous blight of nethermost confusion which blasphemes and bubbles at the center of all infinity—the boundless daemon sultan Azathoth, whose name no lips dare speak aloud, and who gnaws hungrily in inconceivable, unlighted chambers beyond time and space amidst the muffled, maddening beating of vile drums and the thin monotonous whine of accursed flutes
> 

Azathoth's hill.

I hire Wernher Von Braun and Kerman to get your hill into interstellar space.

You doomed hill.

The hill gets spherical.

Hill sphere.

Someone accidentally hits the UNIVERSE RESET BUTTON! Suddenly everything is black. Then the big bang occurs, creating quarks and nucleates in 3 seconds. The Atoms group with electrons, and within 380,000 years enough hydrogen had formed to make a liquid hill floating in space. My liquid hill floating in space

I'm terribly sorry, but you're hallucinating. I claimed the hill while you were doing so.

My generic hill.
the hill rebels against you in it's race to become solid. Now it's my hill. YAY

Who's hill is now?

![9BaGkG.jpg](https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/721x379q90/r/924/9BaGkG.jpg)

Right, it is Tony Montana's hill.

The king has returned.

All your memes are belong to us. I stood upon this hill many years ago and I stand upon it again.

Past main only remain dead! I am the future! And i am the present! And the hill is mine! And im out of cool sounding quotes! And i am very tired typing with my fingers! And i'm also tired to reconquer this darn hill! And please stop reading! And really stop reading! And like stop reading right now! And end.
A metamorph comes in, eats and replaces the previous poster. Its hill.

Long live the king.

\*pushes everyone else over the edge\*
Your kingship sinks. Viva republica.

Ancient athens was a republic. They also got killed, and it wasn't till thousands of years later that democracy was given another chance.

It is GOOD to be the king.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, OdinYggd said:
> 
> 
> It is GOOD to be the king.
> 

Somebody listens to you carefully and sympathetically.

Spoiler

![493px-Oliver_Cromwell_by_Samuel_Cooper.j](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/24/Oliver_Cromwell_by_Samuel_Cooper.jpg/493px-Oliver_Cromwell_by_Samuel_Cooper.jpg)

The royal hill, you say?..

I plant my flag on the hill, and remove all other flags from the hill. You’ll find your flags on that other hill a few miles away.

My privately owned hill.

I establish communism on the other hill.

My other hill.

There is a cold war between the communist greenTurtle1134's hill and Kerbloids Democratic Hill. In a new nuclear war, the two hills launch atomic bombs at themselves and are destroyed as well as everything 1 mile away. 10 years later the scattered dirt is rebuilt by lunatics and is called the DunaManiac's Cobalt Republic of the Hill! (DMCRH)
I build another hill and instill it with democracy. There is another cold war between my democratic hill and DunaManiac"s DMCRH.
Cold war gets cold, and an noone's icy hill covers the subhills.

I claim the icy hill.

my icy hill

I melt your icy hill in the microwave and add a bit of seasoning

My sp-icy hill

**Edited <time datetime="2017-10-20T20:50:15Z" title="10/20/2017 08:50  PM" data-short="6 yr">October 20, 2017</time> by JK\_Kerbineer**

I eat the hill.

My hill.

get rekt.

The hill turns out to be emetic and is vomited immediately.

My puke hill.
